labels.label: Adds tdf_attribute with sample data policy attributes
Set FlowFile content = GetTags output attributes
Get Data Policy Tags from the Tagging Service
Extract the EDH from the record
Process enriched data (original + extracted attributes from EDH)

entry.value: SELECT original.*, enrichment.* FROM original LEFT OUTER JOIN enrichment ON original.id = enrichment.id
